definition: defining rights and duties as opposed to giving the rules by which rights and duties are established, anything indispensable
details:
adjective
- defining rights and duties as opposed to giving the rules by which rights and duties are established
= synonyms: substantive
- basic and fundamental
= example: basic and fundamental
- of the greatest importance
= synonyms: crucial, all-important, all important, of the essence
- absolutely necessary
= synonyms: indispensable
- being or relating to or containing the essence of a plant etc
= example: being or relating to or containing the essence of a plant etc
noun
- anything indispensable
= synonyms: necessary, requisite, requirement, necessity
